reviewText:
I just received my DVD and will rate it excellent! Great customer service locating my order and fully recommend the seller. Will order more items from him and don't hesitate in ordering from him!
Thanks again for finding this series I looked for it for years.

Compre esta pelical pensando que yo ceria el unico que disfrutaria esta pelicula, ya que la primera ves que la vi fue cuando heara un nino. Nunca me inmajine que mis dos hijos la comensarian a ver tambiem. Los primeros capitulos furon tan dramaticos que hicieron llorar a hija y a mi esposa. Nada se compara con esta historya.

What you will find inside this cartoon are the most beautiful principles of life.  REMI will capture your attention till the end of the story.  It will teach everybody who reads, watch or listen this story the most valuables lessons of life.  It is a complete guidance for any growing kid or even older people who due to the stress of life normally separate themselves from nature and emotions.  I wathced the whole cartoon when I was a kid and now 30 years later, I watched it again and learned this time more values than the first time.  It is incredible how a cartoon can instill great values to a person.  It must be assigned to schools as a mandatory lesson.  I really recommend this story.

Spanish/English review follows: Creci viendo esta serie de televisin japonesa de los 80's (que ha sido traducida a varios idiomas), vi la pelcula y lei el libro (del autor francs Hector Malot "Sans Famille (Nobody's Boy, 1878 )"... bella historia acerca de un hurfano ( Remi), que es vendido a un musico callejero (Vitalis) y sus animales entrenados. Remi busca reunirse con su madre adoptiva y aprende sobre el amor, la amistad, el respeto, la lealtad y el verdadero significado de familia. Remi pasa por muchos eventos traumticos, pero tambin aprecia y disfruta de felices aventuras. De nia llor y re, esperando inpacientemente al dia siguiente para ver otro episodio y compartir un captulo ms en la vida de Remi-lo que es raro en los nios de hoy ya que las historias de ahora parecen haber disensitizado a los nios de sentimientos con la violencia. En Remi, cada episodio los nios y los adultos aprender algo acerca de la naturaleza humana y el poder del amor. Recomiendo esta sencilla pero potente historia a todo el mundo. No hay efectos especiales, ni fantasa anime encontraras aqu, slo un lindo cuento sobre un chico y su viaje para tener una familia.

I grew up watching this 80's Japanese tv series (which has been translated to various languages), saw the movie and read the book (from french author Hector Malot " Sans Famille (Nobody's Boy, 1878)"...beautiful story about an orphan (Remi), who is sold to a streetmusician (Vitalis) and his trained animals. Remi's journey to reunite with his adoptive mother is memorable; he learns about love, friendship, respect, loyalty and the true meaning of family. Remi goes through many traumatic times, but also appreciates and enjoys happy adventures. As a young child I cried and laughed, waiting inpatiently for the next day to watch another episode to share one more chapter in Remi's life -which is rare in today's children's stories that appear to have disensitized kids' feelings with violence. In every episode children and adults learn something about human nature and the power of love. I would recommended this simple yet powerful story to everyone. No special effects, no fancy anime here, just a nice little tale about a boy and his journey for a family.
THIS IS ONE OF THE BEST FAMILY ANIMATION SERIES, IT WILL TOUCH YOUR HEART, MAKE YOU LAUGH AND CRY.I TRULLY RECOMMEND IT TO ALL YOU.
Love  it. The best animated story. Once you start watching it you will not be able to stop watching until the end.
Amazing
Wife is pleased
Excellent thanks very good condition
The dvd was delivered before time and that is a A+ . Look great and I'm happy to buy this .
Hubbies Christmas present, he was so happy!  He doesn't want to watch it yet because he knows he'll cry, but we'll enjoy it together and I'll hold his hand.

I purchased this for my boyfriend at the time. This was a cartoon he used to watch as a child and he was so excited when we were able to find it on here and for a good price. It's alwajs nice to have a little piece of your childhood.
I love these series. It is a collectible item.
La serie esta muy bien, como yo la recordava desde mi nies.
Very good seller, responsible 100%

I bought this anime for my mom as a gift since it's one of her favorite childhood cartoons. I watched the first 9 episodes and I have to admit it is wonderful but very sad at the same time. Only by watching the first few episodes, you'll feel empathy for the little boy and all the things he goes through. I highly recommend this anime.
This is a good history and I like a lot .and I'm going to order another  serie for my family. Not today another day.
My Mother loved it she said it brings her back good memories and to me as well great show for those who remember it
Had very good quality. Was very impressed. And interested in buying more from you. Was simple to do all this on line.
Fair copy with ok sound quality.  Have cried watching each dvd. The story is so sad!!!! My children are enjoying it watching it with me every afternoon after school and their Spanish is improving.

I went back to my early years , I enjoyed again the magical feeling of that magical story.
it's amazing I don't remember crying that much ever when i saw it by the first time.

The language was Spanish and unfortunetely shared the same name with the version in Italian; this is not the only problem.
When returned the brend new item, the restocking fee was 50% of the price+ the shipping. I'm very unhappy for all, because would have been much better to keep and donate to someone that to return it. I think that charging someone with 50% restock when the item was unused is not right, furthermore the DVD package was in my view very unprofessional and gave me the idea of having been a used item.
Arrived ahead of schedule, in perfect condition, ordered this for my mom because she watched it as a kid. She said no issues with it all DVD's play perfect and sound great.

I could be more satisfied, with the product, if the first few episodes did not have a bothersome humming noise. The picture quality is good though. Nevertheless, I think I paid a high price for the quality I got.
OMG!!! I am so glad that I was able to find Remi; I used to watch this cartoon when I was little. I am glad that all the DVDs are in one box, very good quality.
I love this series, it take me back to my childhood years ago when tv was so good, the quality of the DVDs are perfect..
Bought This As A Gift For My Husband Who Watched This As A Young Boy, & He Loved It! Great Quality!  Very Impressed!

First of all I just want to say that I am so glad to have found the complete series!!! It was very hard for me to find it, so now that I got it, I am just extremely happy!! =) ...As for the series itself, this is an amazing, interesting, heartouching story that no matter how old you are, Remi gets to you, and it show you the meaning of friendship, love, loyalty and honesty..It is one of those must-have films. It was packaged really really good, the DVDs are of excellent quality, and they are 100% original. The product itself came as described by the seller....It comes only Spanish as they did on TV, which is totally fine with me because that's exactly what I was looking for.  Overall, a great buy!!!

I grew up watching this series when I was in grammar school.
It's not the fact that I grew up watching this series the reason
that makes me attached to it, but rather, it's the instill
values that you learn and cherish from rel life. This series can
soften any stone hearted people, I know it works, it happened
to me. I'm so glad that it was made into
DVD format, thus enabling me to collect it in such good picture
quality. I just hope you know Spanish so
that you can understand and appreciate it.

Disfrut mucho volver a ver Remi, recordaba nicamente los pasajes tristes de la historia, pero descubr que tambin est llena de momentos emocionantes. Remi es una historia que muestra lo que realmente es importante en la vida, lo que cuenta: la amistad, la familia, el trabajo y el esfuerzo constante.

La serie fue tal como la anunciaron y la calidad de los discos tambin. La recomiendo a todas aquellas personas que gustan de los dramas, pero con la esperanza de un maana mejor.

esto es una historia bella. buena para todas las edades. bale la pena comprar este producto a este presio. seria un maravilloso regalo de navidad o de reyes para los ninos.

it is an amazing story great for all ages. i really recommend this product. it is definitely worth it. it would be a great christmas gift for your kids.

Esta es indudablemente una OBRA MAESTRA de la animacion, hace ya una semana que recibi el set, y la verdad no he parado de estar observando uno tras otro de los maravillosos capitulos que conforman esta inigualable serie,al mismo tiempo me transporta a mi infancia,los recuerdos felices llegan a mi, atravez de esta hermosa historia, y en donde esta, tiene un lugar muy importante en mi vida pasada, sin duda alguna REMI es una historia llena de valores morales, de perseverancia, de aliento, de seguir " siempre adelante" una de las frases que se repiten constantemente y que motivan a nuestro personaje principal, ha no dejarse vencer ante los duros golpes que la vida le tiene preparada, bien pues las aventurasRemi La Serie Completa BOX 6 DVDs de REMI y sus amigos, nos hacen recordar, los valores que en la actualidad se han perdido, LA AMISTAD, LA BONDAD, EL SACRIFICIO PERSONAL POR EL BIENESTAR DE OTROS, EL AMOR, LA FAMILIA, yo los invito a todos ustedes que han leido mi nota, a que retomemos estos valores y los difundamos entre los nuestros, solo asi llegaremos a ser mejores hermanos, padres, o hijos, gracias por esta gran obra: 'REMI"

No entiendo porque Amazon no ha censurado estas publicaciones ya que el vendedor ofrece productos Piratas y copiados que ni siquieran son de discos originales.

Me aventure a comprar una vez y de verdad la calidad no es la esperada para el precio y las condiciones del producto dan mucho que desear.

Acostumbro a ser buen cliente cuando encuentro un buen vendedor. Les aseguro que no sere cliente de este vendedor una vez mas.

Por el contrario, les recomiendo a los amigos de Kat's Anime que a pesar de no listar en Amazon, ofrecen material de excelente calidad: Candy, Remi, Mazinger, Heidi, Dragon Ball, Saint Seiya y cientos de series clasicas y peliculas y de verdad a mi parecer, se esfuerzan bastante bien para dar satisfaccion a sus clientes..

No puedo colocar aca la direccion de su pagina web, pero si googlean usando el tag Kat's Anime los podran encontrar en la primera posicion de resultados. Su pagina es muy famosa en Venezuela. Envian a todo el mundo y aceptan PayPal como medio de pago.

Bueno, tal vez mi opinion no ayude a todos, pero espero ayude a muchos a encontrar un buen grupo donde adquirir sus colecciones de oro.. como yo lo hice. Los recomiendo!.

Saludos.

Andreina. Miami, FL.
I remember watching this as a kid. A sad but redeeming tale of a kid's tough life. I thoroughly enjoyed watching it.
